channel.title: RS2D Packet Bug
channel.description:
Hi! I have a question. I think everyone who used RS2D asked this at one point.
Okay well I'm using an RS2D source, the one released by Jim. The problem that I have is, sometimes, TOTALLY RANDOM, the server would just spam a client with packets.
Like one time I was talking to a person and then I disconnect. I see a bunch of
"Unhandled packet [ID = ....]"
In my server log.
This is a MAJOR, MAJOR roadblock in my RS2D source.
ANY help is appreciated.
I will give credits to everyone who helped me if I ever finish my server.

item.title: RS2D Packet Bug
item.dc:creator: @Skullator Skullator
item.description:
@Skullator wrote:

Hi! I have a question. I think everyone who used RS2D asked this at one point.

Okay well I’m using an RS2D source, the one released by Jim. The problem that I have is, sometimes, TOTALLY RANDOM, the server would just spam a client with packets.

Like one time I was talking to a person and then I disconnect. I see a bunch of

“Unhandled packet [ID = …]”

In my server log.

This is a MAJOR, MAJOR roadblock in my RS2D source.

ANY help is appreciated.

I will give credits to everyone who helped me if I ever finish my server.

Read full topic
